comment: The evaluation at a set of the identity function is that set. (General form of ~ ndxarg .) The restriction to a set ` V ` is necessary since the argument of the function ` Slot A ` (like that of any function) has to be a set for the evaluation to be meaningful. (Contributed by BJ, 27-Dec-2021.)
